short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detailed and easier to read overview of Google Analytics 4 (GA4) requests, printing information on the JavaScript console.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Monk Debugger is a powerful Chrome extension that can help you gain deeper insights into your Google Analytics 4 tracking! With this extension installed, you can easily print useful information directly to your JavaScript console, giving you access to a detailed breakdown of each tracking beacon sent to Google Analytics.

Whether you're a digital marketer, website owner, or data analyst, this extension can help you debug your tracking and gain better visibility into your analytics setup.
